Player History
Drafted in 6th round, 92nd overall pick, by Seattle in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/1/2015, off Alphonso Anguita (BOS)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/2/2015, off Antonio Montejano (BOS)...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/18/2015, hitting .476 with 1 HR, 1 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/10/2018, hitting .393 with 4 HR, 6 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by Seattle on 2/2/2020 to a 1-year deal worth $14,500,000 per year...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/17/2020, hitting .435 with 1 HR, 5 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 7/1/2020, hitting .345 with 5 HR, 21 RBI...
Was selected to the 2020 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/24/2020, hitting .500 with 3 HR, 5 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 8/1/2020, hitting .384 with 7 HR, 18 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by Seattle on 3/2/2021 to a 1-year deal worth $14,500,000 per year...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Houston on 6/7/2021...
Injured on 9/13/2021 with a Tight Knee, out for 1-2 weeks...
Released by Seattle on 10/20/2021...
Signed as a free agent by St. Louis (B) on 2/19/2022 to a 1-year deal worth $9,500,000 per year...
Won World Series with St. Louis (B) in 2022...
Signed as a free agent by San Francisco on 2/13/2023 to a 1-year deal worth $8,000,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Philadelphia on 2/2/2024 to a 1-year deal worth $3,000,000 per year...
Injured on 4/8/2024 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for one week...
Was selected to the 2024 Allstar game...
